mapper.select: SELECT r.id, r.roleName, rs.id rsid, rs.url FROM role r LEFT JOIN role_resources rr ON r.id = rr.role_id LEFT JOIN resources rs ON rr.resources_id = rs.id LIMIT #{start},#{length}
SELECT id,url FROM resources WHERE url NOT IN ( SELECT rs.url FROM resources rs LEFT JOIN role_resources rr ON rs.id = rr.resources_id LEFT JOIN role r ON rr.role_id = r.id WHERE r.id = #{id} )
SELECT r.* FROM role r LEFT JOIN user_role ur ON r.id = ur.role_id LEFT JOIN USER u ON ur.user_id = u.id WHERE u.id =#{userId}
